title: Metallic Red 5 Number Numeral Candles - Birthday Cake Topper
features: 【EYE-CATCHING DESIGN and SPARKLING SURFACE 】 The 3D numeral birthday candles are attractive and shiny. The metallic glittering topper candles will provide an elegant effect and romantic atmosphere to your party.

【DIFFERENT SIZES and COLORS AVAILABLE】 We supply 3 different size candles, 1.96inch,2.76inch and 3.93inch, for different size cakes. We have 5 metallic colors, Gold, Red, Blue, Green and Rose gold for your choice.
【SAFE MATERIAL】Our happy birthday cake candles are made of smokeless and non-toxic wax. Odorless and eco-friendly. Easy to insert and light. Burning evenly and consistently

【STRONG PACKAGE】Our number candles, packaged in Kraft paper box, will not be damaged during transportation. Please contact us immediately if there is any issue with your order. We promise 100% refund AT ANY TIME if you're not satisfied with this numeral candle.
【Guaranty】 We promise 6 months unconditional refund and replacement, and our customer service is always ready to help you in 24/7. High quality products and service is our priority.
description: Product description 1: Candle Core Adopting advanced technology, We promise the candle core smokeless and tasteless, no harm to both adults and kids. Each birthday candle can burn for 3-5 minutes evenly and consistently. 2: Metallic Glitter Cake candles are made of food-grade fully refined paraffin, the Metallic glitter won't paint off. Our candles are not fragile like other brands, its strong body to make sure it won't be broken when you receive it and affect your party mood. Make your birthday cake special and stand out. 3: PP Material Stick The natural PP material sticker does not contain harmful substances and can be directly inserted into the cake, which is convenient and sanitary. 4: Number 0-9 Candles You can combine them according to your needs such as 3, 10, 22, 46, 80, etc... Happy birthday candles come in metallic vivid color and glow brightly in dark light. 5: WIDE USAGE: Our sparkler candles are not only suitable for birthday party, but also suitable for wedding, reunion, theme party and other celebration activities. 6: CAUTION Please keep the birthday candles out of reach of children while burning and keep candles in shade place and away from fire. Safety Warning Please keep the birthday candles out of reach of children while burning and keep candles in shade place and away from fire.
